Past Events

10.22 Don Gato Cocktail Tasting

We are introducing our newest cocktail, THE NINE LIVES, in collaboration with Don Gato Tequila üéâüåÆüíÄ

Join us for D√≠a de los Muertos, where you can sample this unique drink and enjoy face painting, delicious food, and a lively atmosphere. Whether you're a tequila aficionado or just looking to try something new, THE NINE LIVES promises to be a delightful addition to your evening.

10.9 Friends at the Beach w/ Mike Lata üå¥üêü

We are so excited to kick off our guest chef series, Friends at the Beach, with a one-night-only dinner where Chef Jason Stanhope will be joined in the kitchen by his mentor and longtime friend Mike Lata from Fig. They share a love of simple yet flavorful food, a dedication to supporting local farmers and purveyors, and a passion for having a good time.
